resources.string: Thank you for using our app! \n We Will Get Back To You Shortly!
Welcome %s! Please pick a meal to plan
%s, please pick a dish for your meal
Ever find yourself wondering what to make? EesyEets helps you decide and make food for any meal!
Pick a meal to get started!
Would You Like To Suggest A New Meal?
If you want to pick a new meal, click the button.

We would Love To Hear Your Feedback 

 How Was Your Experience Using The App? 

 What Can We Do Better?

Would you like to suggest a dish that we can add to this meal?
Hmm, what will you need for breakfast?
Hmm, what will you need for lunch?
Hmm, what will you need for dinner?
One pack of Chicken Legs, All purpose flour, 2 qts of Canola Oil
Noodles, broth (bone broth, chicken or beef), meat (chicken or beef) or seafood.
Two pieces of bread, lunch meat (turkey, chicken, tofu), two slices of cheese (or cheese alternative), two tomato slices.
One head of lettuce, one cups fresh spinach, one tomato, diced olives and mushrooms.
Milk (1%, 2%, skim, or any milk alternative) or water, and any brand of Oatmeal.
Milk (1%, 2%, skim, or any milk alternative), and any brand of cereal. In a bind you can even use granola!
Don\'t have all the ingredients? No problem! Click the link to find a store near you!
Thank you for using rrrrr Thank you!
Ever find yourself wondering what to make? EesyEets helps you decide and make food for any meal!
